name: WordPress 2.6+ and bbPress 0.9 cookie integration
author: Ann Oyama (using WordPress source code)

sections.description:
This plugin is for WordPress 2.6 and up. It enables WordPress to generate cookies that work with bbPress 0.9 so that single sign-on can be accomplished between the two. Follow the usual integration instructions and enable this plugin in your WordPress installation. I also advise clearing your cookies.

Necessary plugin functions were copied and pasted directly from WordPress 2.5.1 pluggable.php. Kudos to WordPress for making it easy!
sections.installation:
1. Upload bbpress-integration.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
